languages.text: "Убей из него кого-нибудь значимого. Это будет лучшей благодарностью".

traits.locale_text: "Убей из него кого-нибудь значимого. Это будет лучшей благодарностью".

languages.text: "Kill someone important with it. That would be the best show of gratitude."
languages.original_text: "Убей из него кого-нибудь значимого. Это будет лучшей благодарностью".

traits.locale_text: "Kill someone important with it. It would be the best show of gratitude."
"Kill someone important with it. It would be the best show of gratitude."
"Kill someone important with it. That would be the best show of gratitude."
"Kill someone important with it. That would be the best show of gratitude."
"Kill someone important with it. That would be the best show of gratitude."

languages.text: 「こいつで要人を殺してみな。それが最高の感謝の示し方だ」
languages.original_text: "Kill someone important with it. That would be the best show of gratitude."

traits.locale_text: 「こいつで要人を殺してみな。それが最高の感謝の示し方だ」

languages.text: “让它沾上某个大人物的鲜血，就是对我最好的答谢。”
languages.original_text: "Kill someone important with it. That would be the best show of gratitude."

traits.locale_text: “让它沾上某个大人物的鲜血，就是对我最好的答谢。”

languages.text: «Si de verdad quiere darme las gracias, úsela para matar a alguien importante».
languages.original_text: "Kill someone important with it. That would be the best show of gratitude."

traits.locale_text: «Si de verdad quiere darme las gracias, úsela para matar a alguien importante».

languages.text: « La meilleure manière de me prouver votre gratitude, ce serait de vous en servir pour tuer quelqu'un d'important. »
languages.original_text: "Kill someone important with it. That would be the best show of gratitude."

traits.locale_text: « La meilleure manière de me prouver votre gratitude, ce serait de vous en servir pour tuer quelqu'un d'important. »

languages.text: "Tötet jemand Bedeutenden damit. Das wäre die beste Form der Dankbarkeit."
languages.original_text: "Kill someone important with it. That would be the best show of gratitude."

traits.locale_text: "Tötet jemand Bedeutenden damit. Das wäre die beste Form der Dankbarkeit."

languages.text: "Bununla önemli birini öldür. En iyi teşekkürü öyle edersin."
languages.original_text: "Kill someone important with it. That would be the best show of gratitude."

traits.locale_text: "Bununla önemli birini öldür. En iyi teşekkürü öyle edersin."
